name: HellMaze
description: It is a 3D maze-finding arcade game that you can enjoy lightly with a keyboard. This is a game of cute characters' journey to find a cool drink in the desert maze of the Wasteland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 4th Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon HD 5670, 1 GB VRAM Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Fast dual-core CPUs or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 970-level GPU with 4GB of video RAM or higher Storage: 1 GB available space
